alert.note: Alert for Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Yalobusha County through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bew Springs, or 8 miles northwest of Grenada, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coffeeville, Scobey, Spearman, Bryant and Gums. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
